title: Cook of the Mercenary Corp - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Chefs   Cooking   Dense Protagonist   Episodic   Legends   Male Protagonist   Mercenaries   Multiple POV   Survival   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Ko Kawai   川井 昂
description: I like cooking. But when I was coming back from shopping, I got lost and ended up being the cook of a mercenary unit. I don’t know why this happened but in order to survive, I will make delicious meals… This is the story of the heroic unit which became a legend in the future and the amazing cook who continued to support them.>
